subject: reports in junit
msgSnippet: Hi All, Had a query about getting JUnit reports in word document format. There is an ant task to get it in html but not in rtf or word document. Any way to
messageBody:
Hi All,

Had a query about getting JUnit reports in word document format. There is an
ant task to get it in html but not in rtf or word document. Any way to
convert that?


Thanks in advance,


Balraj
